title: Thai Chicken Hot and Sour Soup
ingredients: ['185g uncooked long grain white rice', '2.8L water, divided', '3 bone-in chicken breasts', '4 kaffir lime leaves', '1 stick lemon grass, chopped', '5 spring onions, chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh garlic', '350g chopped tomatoes', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '6 fresh mushrooms, chopped', '5 tablespoons chopped coriander', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh red chillies', '1 (40g) pack tamarind soup base']
